directions: Combine, cream cheese, sour cream, basil, Italian parsley, tomatoes, garlic, lemon zest, lemon juice, tomato paste, onion salt, Worcestershire sauce, sugar, and pepper in a large mixing bowl. Beat with an electric mixer on High until whipped, 2 to 3 minutes.
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) packages fat-free cream cheese, softened
1/4 cup fresh flat-leaf Italian parsley, minced
title: Summer Fresh Tomato Basil Dip
